effect_entries.effect:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being infatuated.

Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any wild Pokémon whose species can be either gender has a 2/3 chance of being set to the opposite gender, and a 1/3 chance of having a random gender as usual.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

effect_entries.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

effect_entries.effect:
Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Defense.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
effect_entries.short_effect: Increases Defense to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
